_header: The bruit of evil tongues what woman can eschew

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
The brwett of evill tonges what woman can eschewor who can lett a
                    fowle to wrytt the thinge that is vntrew
DULCosViii9.Note: Added to lower margin, signed, ‘quod Carter’.
